games.title: Druid Mastery: Shapeshifting Guide
games.description: An in-depth guide focusing on the mechanics of the Druid class. Learn how to master shapeshifting to fluidly switch between Werebear and Werewolf forms, optimizing your combat strategy.

games.title: Harnessing the Storm: Elemental Druid Gameplay
games.description: Explore the elemental powers of the Druid class in Diablo 4. This gameplay showcases how to effectively use storm magic to rain destruction upon your enemies.

games.title: Druid Beginner's Walkthrough
games.description: Are you new to the Druid class? Watch this beginner's walkthrough to get a handle on the basics of gameplay and strategies to start your journey in Diablo 4.
